snippet: Bank of Japan policymakers meeting next week will start debating how to justify maintaining their rosy inflation forecasts even as a slew of weak data will likely force them to cut their economic growth projections later this month....

headline.print_headline: BOJ to Stand Pat as Weak Data Tests Its Rosy Price Forecast
headline.main: BOJ to Stand Pat as Weak Data Tests Its Rosy Price Forecast

lead_paragraph: Bank of Japan policymakers meeting next week will start debating how to justify maintaining their rosy inflation forecasts even as a slew of weak data will likely force them to cut their economic growth projections later this month.
